software.description: This dataset provides deidentified imaging data for 5 subjects from an imaging study designed to image the lymphatic system non-invasively using MRI. The associated data was published as a part of an article in Elife ("Human and nonhuman primate meninges harbor lymphatic vessels that can be visualized noninvasively by MRI") and publicized by the NIH Director as a part of his blog (https://directorsblog.nih.gov/2017/10/17...).
